Title: Screams in the Dark
Plot: Two men retire without knowing their new home sits on the graves of people who were tortured and murdered by the KKK. The Queen Mary once ruled the high seas, but now ghosts roam her decks. The ghost of the 10th President of the United States haunts his memorial grave site in Tennessee. Two women experience the results of a curse that was made on a small Texas town.
